title: Best of The Herd: 12/24/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/24/2019
description:
Uncle Colin spreads Holiday Cheer by giving NFL Super Stars near and far the gift they truly need for being oh so good this entire year! The quarterback position is in no way built for Trust Fund kids, Kirk Cousins still has no solution or shown the ability to carry a team in big moments. Make sure you use the eyeball test when looking at the Green Bay Packers rather than trusting the stats because they are truly a limited team going into the post season. Plus, Colin gives you his Super Bowl bubble looking ahead at NFL teams getting ready to head into the playoffs with four teams that can win the Superbowl and a Holiday special Herd Hierarchy!

Guest: Bucky Brooks - FOX Sports NFL Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
